articles.description: Great Britain's Katarina Johnson-Thompson leads the heptathlon after making a superb start in her bid to land the Olympic medal which evades her.
articles.title: Katarina Johnson-Thompson leads in Paris 2024 Olympic heptathlon

articles.description: Britain's Jade Jones falls to another Olympic taekwondo defeat as she is beaten by Miljana Reljkik in the -57kg first round in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics taekwondo: Jade Jones beaten in first round of taekwondo women's -57kg

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.title: Transfers latest, friendlies reaction & Community Shield news conferences

articles.description: Jade Jones loses in the first round of the taekwondo but Katarina Johnson-Thompson makes an excellent to her heptathlon campaign at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 13 of the 2024 Games

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how Manchester City's most likely title rivals are shaping up for the new Premier League season.
articles.title: Premier League: How Arsenal, Liverpool, Chelsea, Man Utd, Tottenham, Aston Villa, Newcastle are looking

articles.description: A member of Australia's hockey team is arrested in Paris and is in custody for allegedly buying cocaine.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Australia hockey player arrested for allegedly buying cocaine

articles.description: Aaron Anselmino signs a seven-year deal at Stamford Bridge as Chelsea agree a £15m deal with Boca Juniors.
articles.title: Aaron Anselmino: Chelsea sign Boca Juniors defender in £15m deal

articles.description: The Netherlands' Sharon van Rouwendaal makes a late move to clinch gold in the women's 10km marathon swim in the River Seine.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Sharon van Rouwendaal clinches gold in 10km marathon swim
